title: Advanced Photography
description: Students produce a portfolio of photographs, read historical and theoretical works, and study photographs and other art works. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ART 156; and one course from ART 150, ART 152A, ART 152C, ART 153, ART 154A, ART 154B, ART 154C or ART 159. Enrollment is restricted to art majors.
